news.summary: Irish actress and activist Margaretta D'Arcy also returned her honorary doctorate from the University Of Galway last month, shortly before her death.

Canadian PM's office and border services "not involved" in announcement banning KNEECAP
news.summary: The Canada Border Services Agency said it "was not implicated in" authorising the announcement, adding it "did not provide advice" and "was not consulted" on the matter.
